feedTitle: NOT ALL WHO WANDER ARE LOST
summary: It's been a hot minute since my last post.  I went away with my wife for the holiday weekend, walked way too far each day, got back with my parents visiting for much of the week, have a kid with strep, feeling run down myself so. I just haven't found the time to write like I'd like...
